name: 陳圳卿
objective:
本課程之目標在於介紹使用者經驗設計之理論與研究方法。藉由本課程的學習，學生能習得互動設計過程中所需要之關鍵概念 - 以使用者經驗為中心之設計。課程以人 - 機 - 境之架構為基礎進行相關知識之講授，並透過相關研究案例之研討、方法之操作以及設計研究之進行了解其原理。課程內容包含人物誌、使用者經驗與需求、互動環境、使用者研究以及認知心理基礎等。教學將以課堂講授、文獻閱讀以及研究方法操作等方式進行，並以報告繳交、分組討論與發表為評量方式。
This course is focused on introducing the theories and research methods of User Experience Design (UXD). In this course, students can understand the key element, UX, of interactive design. This course is set up under the structure of Human-Machine-Scenario theory, and executed through research case studies, method simulation and design research. The contents include personas, user experience and requirements, interactive scenario, user research and cognitive psychology. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, literature review and research conducting. Students are evaluated by reports, group discussion and presentation.
